# Read App Store Version Information

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get information for a specific app store version.

## Getting App Store Versions

- **List All App Store Versions for an App**: Get a list of all App Store versions of an app across all platforms.

items.description: Get a list of all App Store versions of an app across all platforms.
items.name: List All App Store Versions for an App
